Text: There there, shhhh!
Gr...guh... *crash*...
Ahh, Shishi is taking a rest!

Phew, we were able to disguise that he went
unconscious...

Never before has Shishi fallen asleep at Death
Ending... This is...
Lady Alpha, you okay?

Yes. If they had cancelled the presentation of the
kagami rice cake, all our efforts would have been
for nothing...

You two had some bad luck! But no worries, Shishi ate
all of the bad stuff!
Th-Thanks...

(He is always so easygoing... I wonder when and how
I can tell him that his Shishi is a fake...)

Give them a hand for their magnificent battle! Best
of luck to you in the future! Moving on, we present
winning contestant Alpha with the kagami rice cake!

(*sigh*... It really was a lot of trouble, but it is
finally over, and we now have the kagami rice
cake.)
Here you go! It's heavy, so take care holding it.
Thank you.

(It truly is beautiful. I can almost see my own
reflection in its flat surface).
Lady Alpha, you look so happy!

Oh, you can see it on my face? Well, we worked hard
for this.
Yeah, let's make Boss man happy!
Yes, let's surprise Cid. Let's go home!
You found kagami rice cake? Really?
Really! Show him, Lady Alpha!

Here, kagami rice cake that was given to us at the
Great Ize Shrine.
Huh? This is...?

(Wisdom has been recreated pretty faithfully up to
now, but in this case kagami rice cakes turned out
to be something unique to this world, even if they
didn't change the name.)
How...interesting.
What? Is there something wrong?
No, nothing. Well done, Alpha.

Hehe, just doing my job. So you said you have to put
the kagami rice cake somewhere? Where?

It's bigger and bulkier than I thought. Actually, I
want to put it over there, but...

You went through all of that to get it, so why don't
we eat it with everyone? I wonder what it tastes like.

Graaarf! I'm starving 'cause we did so much exercise.
Lady Alpha told me not to buy or eat anything!

My apologies. We entered the Great Ize-athlon, and
then I wanted to get the prize to you quickly...

Looks like you two worked hard, so I'll do the
cooking.

Oh, you'll do it yourself? You don't have to if you
don't want to, okay? Though...I would enjoy your
cooking.

At the very least, I can just grill or boil it.
Ah, seasoning is also important.

Soy sauce, roasted soybean flour, adzuki beans for
red bean soup... I've got this.

Well, certainly I could ask Zeta and the others to
research it...
I want to eat Boss man's homemade food!
Right, it's settled! So what sounds best?

If I grill it with soy sauce, it'll be salty. Roasted
soybean flour will make it sweet, I think. I'd
have to powder it with flour.

If you make it powdery, Delta will blow off all the
flour.
I don't like stuff that's too salty or sweet. Yuck.

Then I think red bean soup is the winner. The beans
are naturally sweet, but I think you'll like it.

Red bean soup! Red bean soup! What kinda food it is?
I don't care, I wanna eat it!

It'll be fun to try making it. This kagami rice cake
is massive, so there should be plenty for all of
the Seven Shadows.
In the meantime I'll gather everyone together, then.
Here you go. This is red bean soup.
A soup dish... Soup?

There are bits of rice cake, and it smells sweet...
Maybe it's a comfort food? Good for cold days or
when you feel tired?

I see... So kagami rice cakes are pliable. So many
forms... Stretched or even filled with air. It's just as
you said, Cid.

It's still hot, so be careful not to burn your
tongue.
Grrrr, grrrrrr...
Haha. Hey dog, isn't it hot for your tongue?
Not at all! *gulp* Grrrrr!
This rice cake... It's so stretchy.

Grrr... You're on, Zeta! Let's see who can stretch it
the most!

*sigh*... If you're trying to sell a fight, I've got
no choice but to buy in. Can't let you think I'll
run away.

(Rice cake...soft when warm, hard when cool. This
might be the next big thing after slime...)

Hey, look at Epsilon. She's carefully checking how
stretchy it is.
Huh? Ohhhh, yes? I mean, yes!

Everyone, we had to say something before we started
eating.
Oh, sorry...

Hahaha, Delta is pretty hungry. Okay, everyone, let's
eat.
Let's eat!
So this is red bean soup...
How is it? I hope you like it.
Yes, it has a refined sweetness, and it warms you up.

Honestly speaking, you really surprised me when you
brought back this kagami rice cake. I kinda didn't
expect it.

Don't underestimate the potential of the Shadow
Garden. This is the power of the organization that
you created.

In fact, it's more of an organization that you
created.
I really didn't want to create it. But you...
*munch, munch* Arg...!
The stupid dog got a rice cake stuck in her throat!

It says in books that it will come out if you thump
her on the back!
Oh dear! Delta, are you okay?

(Dear me, this year started with an uproar. But...
It's not so bad to have a bit of chaos.)

(I hope that we can get through this year without
losing anyone...)
